overview: Rome, October 27th 2021. The DDL Zan, a law against homotransphobia didn't passed and the politicians started to applause and scream of joy for what happened. APPLAUSI is a short movie, ninety seconds of faces and stories in defense of those who were trampled on by the Italian Senators in the exultation of the stadium following the dropping of the law against homotransphobia.
title: Applausi
